Mike Lin wrote:

> So I want to only start the receiving thread once per
> =
testcase and not once per test.

Notice that you are confusing the terminol=
ogy somewhat.

A TestCase class is not a testcase (in the same way a Custom=
er class is not
a single customer). A TestCase *instance* is a testcase. An=
d as the default
way for Junit is to create one instance per test method, t=
ypically a test
method (what you probably called test above) is a testcase.=


The whole TestCase class gets converted into a TestSuite instance contain=
ing
one TestCase instance per test method.

So what you actually want to do=
 is starting the thread only once per test
suite...

Hope this helps,

Ilja=
